title: Indian Doctor’s theory rubbishing Coronavirus is false; here’s the fact check | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video has been circulating on social media posted by Dr Biswaroop Roy Chowdhury, with the claim that Coronavirus is a regular flu that will affect all of us in our lifetime. He further says that we do not need to take any precautionary measures to prevent the spread of Coronavirus.

The caption of the video reads:

“In this video, Dr Biswaroop Roy Chowdhury presented the explosive evidence that will help the audience to permanently remove the fear of coronavirus.”

ALSO READ: PM Modi is NOT declaring Emergency under Article 360; don’t believe…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above video and found it to be FAKE.

To begin with, we checked the background of the man in the video. We came across several news articles referring to him as a fraud.

Hence, the above information establishes the fact that the man in the viral video is not an authentic doctor and his claims cannot be believed.
